title: I Did Something Bad
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:05.72] I never trust a narcissist
[00:07.80] But they love me
[00:11.35] So I play 'em like a violin
[00:13.51] And I make it look, oh, so easy
[00:17.28] 'Cause for every lie I tell them
[00:19.31] They tell me three
[00:23.36] This is how the world works
[00:25.18] Now all he thinks about is me
[00:29.89] I can feel the flames on my skin
[00:32.77] Crimson red paint on my lips
[00:35.30] If a man talks shit, then I owe him nothing
[00:37.94] I don't regret it one bit, 'cause he had it comin'
[00:42.59] 
[00:45.21] They say I did something bad
[00:47.91] Then why's it feel so good?
[00:51.08] They say I did something bad
[00:53.90] Then why's it feel so good?
[00:56.95] Most fun I ever had
[00:59.85] And I'd do it over and over
[01:02.15] And over again if I could
[01:05.46] It just felt so good, good
[01:10.85] 
[01:21.09] I never trust a playboy
[01:23.02] But they love me
[01:26.72] So I fly 'em all around the world
[01:28.73] And I let them think they saved me
[01:32.58] They never see it coming
[01:34.53] What I do next
[01:38.40] This is how the world works
[01:40.32] You gotta leave before you get left
[01:45.13] I can feel the flames on my skin
[01:47.78] He says, "Don't throw away a good thing"
[01:50.47] But if he drops my name, then I owe him nothing
[01:53.45] And if he spends my change, then he had it comin'
[01:58.10] 
[02:00.59] They say I did something bad
[02:03.03] Then why's it feel so good?
[02:06.17] They say I did something bad
[02:09.06] Then why's it feel so good?
[02:12.16] Most fun I ever had
[02:14.93] And I'd do it over and over
[02:17.35] And over again if I could
[02:20.65] It just felt so good, good
[02:26.43] 
[02:29.50] It just felt so good
[02:33.91] 
[02:36.66] They're burning all the witches even if you aren't one
[02:42.87] They got their pitchforks and proof
[02:45.71] Their receipts and reasons
[02:48.38] They're burning all the witches even if you aren't one
[02:53.35] So light me up, light me up (Light me up, light me up)
[02:56.81] Light me up, go ahead and light me up (Light me up, light me up)
[02:59.63] Light me up, light me up (Light me up, light me up)
[03:02.51] Light me up, light me up (Light me up)
[03:07.07] They say I did something bad
[03:09.59] Then why's it feel so good? (Good)
[03:12.89] They say I did something bad
[03:15.69] Then why's it feel so good?
[03:18.62] Most fun I ever had (Most fun I ever had)
[03:21.53] And I'd do it over and over, and over again if I could
[03:27.28] It just felt so good, good
[03:33.10] 
[03:35.65] Oh, they say I did something bad
[03:37.54] (They say I did something bad)
[03:38.90] Then why's it feel so good, good?
[03:43.29] So bad, why's it feel so good?
[03:46.12] Why's it feel, why's it feel so good? (Bad)
[03:50.28] It just felt so good, good
[03:53.55]
